contentfulTextarea.textContent:
## Hi, I'm Jackie! ### I’m an artist and digital designer who creates playful, narrative experiences with (and often about) technology. My creative practice is primarily autobiographical–telling stories based on my own life to explore my relationship with myself and create relational moments with others. I constantly shift between and merge various media–the web, comics, user interface design, games, performance-as a way of experimenting with narratives and what new modes of relating can follow. In parallel, I care about extending themes and methods in my practice as creative prompts for others. Previously, I've given talks, hosted workshops and classes, and written curriculum and zines about design and creative coding–with emphasis on moments for self-reflection, critical engagement, and creating from a place of healing and values alignment. I'm open to artistic collaborations, sharing my work in both online and IRL contexts, and giving talks and workshops. If any of this resonates with you, I'd love to get in touch!
   hi@jackieis.online
### residencies - __[CultureHub Resident Artist](https://www.culturehub.org/ "CultureHub website")__, December 2023 - __[NEW INC Year 9 Member - Art and Code Track](https://www.newinc.org/ "NEW INC website")__, September 2022 -
